entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: N 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with ice pellets late this evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 10:53 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
